resources.string: Use the buttons below to manage the GiffGaff Internet / MMS settings.
Congratulations! You have the GiffGaff APN settings, but GiffGaff is not the default APN. You should set GiffGaff as the default APN.
Congratulations! \nYou are all set for MMS and Internet.
You dont have any GIffGaff ANP settings, hit \"Add GiffGaff APN\" below to get going."
Sorry, failed to create GiffGaff APN :(
GiffGaff APN has been set as default!
Oops, GiffGaff APN could not be set as default
You have other APN\'s that may conflict and cause 3G problems, you should delete the other APNs.
Are you sure you want to delete the GiffGaff APN?
